properties.name: stripe.secret.key
properties.description: Stripe API secret key for payment processing (set via STRIPE_SECRET_KEY env var)

properties.name: stripe.public.key
properties.description: Stripe API public key for client-side token generation (set via STRIPE_PUBLIC_KEY env var)

properties.name: stripe.endpoint.secret
properties.description: Stripe webhook endpoint secret for validating webhook signatures (set via STRIPE_ENDPOINT_SECRET env var)

properties.name: firebase.admin.json
properties.description: Path to Firebase Admin SDK service account JSON file or env var with content (set via FIREBASE_ADMIN_JSON env var)

properties.name: firebase.database.url
properties.description: Firebase Realtime Database URL (set via FIREBASE_DB_URL env var)

properties.name: firebase.project.id
properties.description: Firebase project ID for Cloud Messaging and Firestore (set via FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID env var)

properties.name: google.maps.api.key
properties.description: Google Maps API key for backend location services (set via GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY env var)

properties.name: sendgrid.api.key
properties.description: SendGrid API key for email delivery (set via SENDGRID_API_KEY env var)

properties.name: sendgrid.from.email
properties.description: Sender email address for SendGrid emails

properties.name: twilio.account.sid
properties.description: Twilio Account SID for SMS sending (set via TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID env var)

properties.name: twilio.auth.token
properties.description: Twilio authentication token (set via TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN env var)

properties.name: twilio.phone.number
properties.description: Twilio phone number for sending SMS messages
